Html:
Hi,

Your tool is very cool. It's very helpful. Thank you very much. 
I'm wondering if there is a way to change the configuartion of this tool so that it can support session tracking?
Specifically, I saw "useCookiesContainer" field in the source code, and I wonder if it allows to set up a cookies in order to support session.
Thanks again.

Chien

Hi Chienchien,

    Yes, cookie support can be added.  I haven't actually fully implemented the cookie-support because I didn't not many people would be using that feature. Anyway, I'll add that when I find some time. :)

~Erik
